Class CLIPlaceWorkerPhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toCLI.interfaces.CLISubTurnViewer

All Implemented Interfaces:
SpecificSubTurnViewer
public class CLIPlaceWorkerPhase
extends CLISubTurnViewer
Class that represents the CLISubTurnViewer PlaceWorker on the CLI using methods of CLIPrintFunction and ANSIStyle
Author:
Marco
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • placeWorkerRequest

      private boolean placeWorkerRequest​(int workerToPlace)
      Prints a request to place the worker and checks it, returns true if the response is correct and correctly set or false if it isn't
      Parameters:
      workerToPlace - number of ViewWorker chosen
      Returns:
      true if the ViewCell is correctly chosen and set, else false

      public void show()
      Prints the board and uses a private method to ask the cell where place worker and check his response as long as the place response is correctly set
